jcr:content.jcr:description: Altra’s special edition Olympus 4 is inspired by Ryan Willms and done in collaboration with Reigning Champ. Learn more about this one-of-a-kind trail shoe.
jcr:content.jcr:title: Altra x Reigning Champ Olympus 4

customhtml2_11446045.customHTML:
ALTRA X REIGNING CHAMP
WITH RYAN WILLMS

text_copy.text:
Our special edition Olympus 4 is inspired by Ryan Willms

and done in collaboration with Reigning Champ

customhtml2_copy_cop.customHTML: We Partnered with Reigning Champ and Into the Well founder Ryan Willms and took our classic Olympus 4, known and trusted for its high cushioned technical features, and combined it with Reigning Champ's approach to making some of the finest athletic wear in the world to launch a full collection with special colors.

text_copy_copy.text: The collection is made for the mountains and the trails with a focus on cool weather running with our gaiter-equipped trail shoe.

customhtml2_copy_cop.customHTML:
Each pair of limited edition Altra x Reigning Champ x
Ryan Willms Olympus 4 is equipped with a matching
tie-dye gaiter for $220.

The palette of washed indigo, deep navy, and tie-dye reflects the blue hues of the mountains, and the ways the color shifts in the sunlight - placing an emphasis on organic evolution, movement and impermanence

text_copy_copy_copy.text: Women Styles are only available on AltraRunning.com

text_copy_copy.text: The full apparel collection is available on ReigningChamp.com
